dict.acceptation: 滑落；下跌；打滑；[棒球]滑垒；
衰落（成）；逐渐降低；使悄悄转动；（使）快捷而悄声地移动；

sent.orig: This slide can't be expanded. The slide must have a body placeholder that contains text.
sent.trans: 此幻灯片无法展开。请确认此幻灯片有包含文本的主要占位符。

sent.orig: Simply slide to reveal the dedicated media keys and slide back to access the numeric keypad.
sent.trans: 只要幻灯片显示专用媒体按键和倒退进入数字键盘。

sent.orig: Can be divided into: single hook slide rails, double hook slide rails.
sent.trans: 本类型机可分：单吊钩滑轨、双吊钩滑轨。

sent.orig: Slide Navigator can only run in a Slide Show window.
sent.trans: “幻灯片漫游”只能在幻灯片放映窗口运行。
